text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After not seeing her at the tryouts, I<n>find Rice Shower crying
near a stump.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... Um, I'm sorry, but...could you not get any closer?
choice_data_list: Why not?
Why not?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Because... I only bring misfortune<n>upon the people around
me. I'll weigh<n>you down... I'm just a nuisance...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to be useful, to be strong... I<n>was going to give it
my all and enter a<n>race, but in the end...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking at Rice Shower crying in front<n>of me, I think back to
when I saw her<n>the other day.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Nuh-uh, I have to try even harder!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I already made up my mind to enter<n>the upcoming tryouts.
I'll actually<n>enter, actually run, and then...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'll make my debut and win a bunch<n>of races... Then, I
won't be a burden<n>anymore!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I don't know the details, but I do<n>know that she was trying
to change<n>herself for the better. She was<n>training harder
than anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sob... sniffle... I'm... I'm nothingmore than—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I can't leave her like this!
choice_data_list: Rice Shower, I want to scout you!
Rice Shower, I want to scout you!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: By scout, you mean... You want to be<n>my trainer?
choice_data_list: Only if that's what you want too.
Only if that's what you want too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahhh... I-I'm, um... very, very happy,<n>but!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm... just a good-for-nothing, you<n>know? I only cause
trouble for others,<n>and I can't even enter a race I signed<n>
up for...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Knowing all that, do you still want me?
choice_data_list: I want to help you move past all that.
I want to help you move past all that.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Wow... Just like a real big brother...
choice_data_list: Big brother?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Wow... Just like a real big sister...
choice_data_list: Big brother?
Big sister?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah! N-never mind, forget that!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But, um, if you're sure... then let's<n>get along, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'll give it everything I have!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Wiping away her tears, Rice musters<n>all her strength and
flashes me a<n>warm smile.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's time for my first training session<n>with Rice. I'm already
at the track<n>waiting for her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice appears, lugging an enormous<n>backpack stuffed to
bursting. She<n>drops it by the edge of the track and<n>runs
over to me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... S-sorry for the wait!I'm looking forward to today'straining!
choice_data_list: What's up with the luggage?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, um... They're all insurance in<n>case bad things happen
while we're<n>here. Like bandages, or sports tape...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Not to mention an umbrella in case it<n>rains, a change of
clothes, and of<n>course—mayonnaise if we get<n>stranded on
the way back!
choice_data_list: B-better safe than sorry, I guess?
B-better safe than sorry, I guess?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah... I-it's our first training session<n>after all, so I wanted to
make sure I<n>didn't mess things up... Am I being<n>weird?
choice_data_list: Mess things up?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Mhm. Ever since I was little, I've<n>been causing all kinds of
misfortune.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The kids around me would trip, their<n>shoelaces would tear,
and sometimes<n>even bird poop would land on their<n>
heads...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm a hopeless girl who causes<n>trouble for others...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
They all sound like unlucky accidents<n>to me, but I guess
she's the kind of<n>person who feels responsible for<n>things
like that.
choice_data_list: (She really is a kind and caring soul...)
(She really is a kind and caring soul...)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah! I've been talking too much again!I'm so, so, so sorry!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Let's just start training already!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite being our first training<n>session, Rice diligently
completes the<n>entire training menu I prepared for<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Um... how was mytime?
choice_data_list: Faster than expected! I'm super impressed!
Faster than expected! I'm super impressed!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Really?! Th-that's a relief!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Um... Trainer, do you mind if I go for<n>another run? I-I'm still
full of energy!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I want to work some more on that<n>technique you taught me
for running<n>around curves.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I feel like I'm getting the hang of<n>speeding up my pace! I-is
that a no?
choice_data_list: Not at all—go for it!
Not at all—go for it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to Rice being eager and quick<n>to learn, we finish
today's training<n>without a single problem.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah... M-Mr. Sun is already going to<n>bed...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I didn't notice at all until now... I was<n>just so happy to be
running.
choice_data_list: I'm glad you had fun today.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Y-yeah! It was super fun, really!<n>You're so nice, Trainer...
just like a<n>real big brother...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Y-yeah! It was super fun, really!<n>You're so nice, Trainer...
just like a<n>real big sister...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Growl...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Ah, ah, ahhh, I'm sorry! Miss<n>Tummy, shhh—I said
shhh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
To commemorate an amazing first<n>training session, I decide
to treat her to<n>dinner.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer, is it really okay for me to<n>get anything I want?
choice_data_list: It's on me, so don't be shy!
It's on me, so don't be shy!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Anything I want! Anything... anything,<n>hmmm...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Following her gaze, I see a huge<n>banner in front of a ramen
shop that<n>reads, "Mega Mountain Deluxe."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not wanting to waste a single second,<n>I suggest that we
head inside.

text_block_list.name: Ramen Shop Owner
text_block_list.text:
With that, the Mega Mountain Deluxe<n>is sold out for today!
Please come<n>back again tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah! Oh...
choice_data_list:
Rice, go ahead and order every topping on the
menu!

Rice, go ahead and order every topping on the
menu!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: R-really?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, with smiles and surprisingly<n>large bellies, our first
day of training<n>comes to an end.
